head.title: kcgi | minimal CGI library for C

body.header:
kcgi — minimal CGI library for C
version @VERSION@ Sources Archives

article.p: kcgi is a minimal CGI library for web applications (HTML and HTTP) in C. It was designed to be simple, permissibly-licensed, and auditable. See a Comparison of CGI Libraries in C for alternatives. kcgi is a BSD.lv project.

ul.li: lightweight functions for building HTML trees
safe memory allocation functions (inspired by OpenSSH)
automatic field (request, form, and cookie) validation

article.p: The library itself consists of easily-auditable ISO C sources under the ISC license. The kcgi(3) manpage documents all function, variables, and usage. To use the library, download kcgi.tgz and run make install into your PREFIX of choice.
Initial public release. The library has been used by several small-scale applications.
